---
title: Compact Bone
---



Compact bone is considered "dense" and "unyielding" which allows it to withstand large forces @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.



# Examples

The [femur]({{< ref-femur-bone.path >}}) contains compact bone in its cortex which aids in force absorption @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.
